title: Quarkus 2.15.3.Final released - Maintenance release
content: Today, we released Quarkus 2.15.3.Final, our third maintenance release for Quarkus 2.15. As usual it comes with bugfixes and documentation improvements. It is a recommended upgrade for anyone already using 2.15. If you are not already using 2.15, please refer to our migration guide. Full changelog You can get the...
